summary: A grieving mother sets out to find the murderer of her daughter.
cast: Patty Duke|Tiffani Thiessen|Margaret Welsh|Angie Rae McKinney|David Cubitt|Janne Mortil|Loretta Swit|Debra Sharkey|Ben Bass|Chad Todhunter|William S. Taylor|Babs Chula|Matthew Bennett|Heather Beaty|Shannon Beaty|Alf Humphreys|Barry Pepper|Lisa Vultaggio|Jacques Lalonde|Catherine Lough Haggquist|Rene Mankuma|Charles Andre|Alfonso Quijada
title: Crimen entre amigas
